original_text: how he entered the house of God, in the time of Abiathar the high priest, and ate the bread of the Presence, which it is not lawful for any but the priests to eat, and also gave it to those who were with him?”
korean_text: 그가 아비아달 대제사장 때에 하나님의 전에 들어가서 제사장 외에는 먹어서는 안 되는 진설병을 먹고 함께 한 자들에게도 주지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: how he entered the house of God
in the time of Abiathar the high priest
and ate the bread of the Presence
which it is not lawful for any but the priests to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장 외에는 아무도 먹지 못하는 법이었는데

sentences.original_text: and also gave it to those who were with him?”
